dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Latin text and p. number on verso: Quarta Asiae tabula ... 20. Shows the Eastern Mediterranean and the Middle East from Cyprus to Babylonia. Appears in Ptolemy's Geographia universalis, 1540 ed., rev. & ed. by Sebastian Münster.
